channel.title: EvoScape || VPS Hosting || 24/7 || Need Staff || Brand new!
channel.description:
[center]RuneEvo v1.0 Official Client! last post edit: 4/29/2014 [url=http://www.runeportal.grn.cc]Website[/url] [url=http://runeportal.grn.cc/index.php?threads/latest-client.14/]Download Most Up-To-Date Client[/url][/center] With RuneEvo v1.0 comes a ton of development content! We'll begin adding new content daily, the community brand new, and we're looking for staff and players!
[center][spoiler=Media] Spawn [img]http://i.imgur.com/Vx8LnHy.png[/img] Rockcrabs w/ Admin Console [img]http://i.imgur.com/kTQSU4x.png[/img] [/spoiler][/center] [url=http://runeportal.grn.cc/index.php?threads/overhaul-complete.15/#post-24]More information on the overhaul[/url].

item.title: EvoScape || VPS Hosting || 24/7 || Need Staff || Brand new!
item.dc:creator: @Gabinhash Gabinhash
item.description:
@Gabinhash wrote:

It’s still in development. It’s not a huge deal.
The client+server was released to the public for use. I’m using it.

I’m not stealing credit for whoever coded it. We switched sources from Aggroth to Zenith, and I’ve given him 100% credit.

Read full topic

item.title: EvoScape || VPS Hosting || 24/7 || Need Staff || Brand new!
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[quote=“Gabinhash, post:3, topic:542639”][quote author=furyking50 link=topic=661515.msg4421675#msg4421675 date=1398735978]
Good luck but is the client supposed to look exactly like aggroth?
[/quote]

Yes, but only for a bit. The client was just released today, and I’m still coding it.[/quote]
Why would you host if you just started… That’s practically admitting to leeching.

Read full topic
